verses.verse: שִׁ֥יר <WH7892> shir A Song הַֽמַּֽעֲל֗וֹת <WH4609> ham-ma-'a-Lot, of degrees לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <WH1732> le-Da-Vid of David יְהוָ֤ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh LORD לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- nor גָבַ֣הּ <WH1361> ga-Vah is not haughty לִ֭בִּי <WH3820> Lib-bi my heart וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- Nor רָמ֣וּ <WH7311> ra-Mu lofty עֵינַ֑י <WH5869> 'ei-Nai; nor mine eyes וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- Nor הִלַּ֓כְתִּי׀ <WH1980> hil-Lach-ti neither do I exercise בִּגְדֹל֖וֹת <WH1419> big-do-Lot myself in great matters וּבְנִפְלָא֣וֹת <WH6381> u-ve-nif-la-'ot or in things too high מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <WH4480> mi-Men-ni. too

אִם־ <WH518> 'im- lo לֹ֤א <WH3808> lo not שִׁוִּ֨יתִי׀ <WH7737> shiv-Vi-ti Surely I have behaved וְדוֹמַ֗מְתִּי <WH1826> ve-do-Mam-ti, and quieted נַ֫פְשִׁ֥י <WH5315> naf-Shi myself כְּ֭גָמֻל <WH1580> Ke-ga-mul as a child that is weaned עֲלֵ֣י <WH5921> 'a-Lei child against אִמּ֑וֹ <WH517> im-Mo; of his mother כַּגָּמֻ֖ל <WH1580> kag-ga-Mul [is] even as a weaned child עָלַ֣י <WH5921> 'a-Lai within נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> naf-Shi. my soul

יַחֵ֣ל <WH3176> ya-Chel hope יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'el Let Israel אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- in יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; in the LORD מֵֽ֝עַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> me-'at-Tah, this וְעַד־ <WH5704> ve-'ad- from henceforth and for עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> o-Lam. ever
